Uses of Class
org.xflatdb.xflat.query.XPathQuery

  • Packages that use XPathQuery 
    Package Description
    org.xflatdb.xflat
    This package contains the public interface for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.db
    This package contains the core classes for XFlat.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.engine
    This package contains the implementations of Engine that are provided by XFlat out of the box.
    org.xflatdb.xflat.query
    This package contains classes related to XPath-based queries.

    • Uses of XPathQuery in org.xflatdb.xflat

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Table.deleteAll(XPathQuery query)
      Deletes all rows matching the given query.
      Cursor<T> Table.find(XPathQuery query)
      Gets a cursor over all the values matching the Xpath query.
      java.util.List<T> Table.findAll(XPathQuery query)
      Gets a list of all the values matching the Xpath query.
      T Table.findOne(XPathQuery query)
      Finds the first value matching the Xpath query.
      boolean Table.replaceOne(XPathQuery query, T newValue)
      Replaces the first value matched by the query with the new value.
      int Table.update(XPathQuery query, XPathUpdate update)
      Applies an update to all data matching a given query.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static XPathQuery XPathQuery.and(XPathQuery... queries)
      Create an XPath query that matches when all of the provided queries match.
      static XPathQuery XPathQuery.any()
      An XPathQuery that matches any and all rows regardless of content.
      static <U> XPathQuery XPathQuery.eq(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<?> selector, U object)
      Creates an XPath query that matches the single element at the selector to the value.
      static XPathQuery XPathQuery.exists(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<?> selector)
      functions the same as ne(selector, null), but does not invoke the conversion service.
      XPathQuery InvalidQueryException.getQuery()
      Gets the query that was invalid.

      XPathQuery      		 XPathQuery.gt(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<?> selector, U object)
      Creates an XPath query that matches when the single element at the selector has a value that is greater than the given value.
      static <U extends java.lang.Comparable<U>> 
      XPathQuery      		 XPathQuery.gte(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<?> selector, U object)
      Creates an XPath query that matches when the single element at the selector has a value that is greater than or equal to the given value.

      XPathQuery      		 XPathQuery.lt(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<?> selector, U object)

      static <U extends java.lang.Comparable<U>> 
      XPathQuery      		 XPathQuery.lte(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<?> selector, U object)
      Creates an XPath query that matches when the single element at the selector has a value that is less than or equal to the given value.

      Create an XpathQuery that matches when the given matcher matches the value selected by the Xpath selector.
      static <U> XPathQuery XPathQuery.ne(org.jdom2.xpath.XPathExpression<?> selector, U object)
      Creates an XPath query that matches when the single element at the selector does not exist or is not equal to the value.
      static XPathQuery XPathQuery.or(XPathQuery... queries)
      Create an XpathQuery that matches when any of the provided queries match.
